column4: Can anyone help me with this network issue? Whenever i try to go to a website, it says it cannot find the host immediatley. However, if i Keep pushing retry, it eventually finds it. This is for all new requests, even things like google. Any ideas?
DNS issue probably
well it doesnt happen when I'm on windows
how is you network setup ?
its weird that it dies instantly
just DHCP from a linksys router
ping google.com
it comes back instantly with no response
no response ?
yea it comes back no response instantly. Then the second try it works fine
put in DNS servers your linksys ip
yea my DNS server is my linksys router
pastebin your ifconfig
yea do unop suggestion first, /etc/resolv.conf its important that it be in there first
unop: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/3997/
ping 192.168.1.1 , does it respond fine ?
yup, everything is ok
the exact same setup works perfectly when i boot into windows
ok, yes, you should follow unop suggestion
unop : http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/3998/ includes the dig
sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
